glyphs.name: Glyph of Die by the Sword

spell.name: Juggernaut
spell.description: You can Charge every 12 sec instead of every 20 sec.

spell.name: Double Time
spell.description:
You can use Charge twice in a row. Each use has a 20 sec recharge time.



Charge can only grant Rage once every 12 sec.

spell.name: Warbringer
spell.description: Your Charge also knocks a target to the ground, stunning it for 3 sec and reducing movement speed by 50% for 15 sec.

spell.name: Enraged Regeneration
spell.description:
Instantly heals you for 5% of your total health, and an additional 5% over 5 sec. 



Can be used while stunned.



Effects are doubled if used while Enraged.

spell.name: Second Wind
spell.description: Whenever you are below 35% health, you regenerate 3% health per second.

spell.name: Impending Victory
spell.description:
Instantly attack the target causing 1,278 damage and healing you for 15% of your maximum health.



Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and causes your next Impending Victory to heal for 20% of your maximum health.



Replaces Victory Rush.

spell.name: Staggering Shout
spell.description: Causes all enemies within 20 yards that are snared to become rooted for 5 sec. Damage caused may interrupt the effect.

spell.name: Piercing Howl
spell.description: Snares all enemies within 15 yards, reducing their movement speed by 50% for 15 sec.

spell.name: Disrupting Shout
spell.description: Interrupts all spellcasting within 10 yards and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 4 sec.

spell.name: Bladestorm
spell.description:
You become a whirling storm of destructive force, striking all targets within 8 yards for 120% weapon damage every 1 sec for 6 sec.



During a Bladestorm, you can continue to dodge, block, and parry, and are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects. However, you can only perform shout abilities.

spell.name: Shockwave
spell.description:
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone before you, causing 43 damage and stunning all enemy targets within 10 yards for 4 sec.



Causing damage to 3 or more targets lowers the cooldown of the next Shockwave by 20 sec.

spell.name: Dragon Roar
spell.description: Roar ferociously, causing 206 damage to all enemies within 8 yards, knocking them back and knocking them down for 0.50 sec. Dragon Roar is always a critical strike and ignores all armor on the target.

spell.name: Mass Spell Reflection
spell.description: Reflects the next spell cast on you and on all party and raid members within 20 yards for 5 sec.

spell.name: Safeguard
spell.description:
Run at high speed towards a party or raid member, removing all movement-impairing effects upon you, intercepting the next melee or ranged attack made against them and reducing their damage taken by 20% for 6 sec.



Replaces Intervene.

spell.name: Vigilance
spell.description:
Focus your protective gaze on a party or raid member, transferring 30% of damage taken to you for 12 sec.



During the duration of Vigilance, your Taunt has no cooldown.

spell.name: Avatar
spell.description: You transform into a colossus for 24 sec, breaking all roots and snares and increasing your damage dealt by 20%.

spell.name: Bloodbath
spell.description: For the next 12 sec, causes your melee special attacks to deal an additional 30% damage as a bleed over 6 sec. While bleeding, the target moves at 50% reduced speed.

spell.name: Storm Bolt
spell.description: Hurl your weapon at an enemy, causing 125% weapon damage and stunning the target for 3 sec.  Deals an additional 375% weapon damage to targets that are permanently immune to stuns.

specs.name: Arms
specs.description: A battle-hardened master of two-handed weapons, using mobility and overpowering attacks to strike his opponents down.

specs.name: Fury
specs.description: A furious berserker wielding a weapon in each hand, unleashing a flurry of attacks to carve her opponents to pieces.

specs.name: Protection
specs.description: A stalwart protector who uses a shield to safeguard herself and her allies.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Fire From the Heavens
Glyph of Hammer of the Righteous
Glyph of Protector of the Innocent

spell.name: Speed of Light
spell.description: Increases your movement speed by 70% for 8 sec.

spell.name: Long Arm of the Law
spell.description: A successful Judgment increases your movement speed by 45% for 3 sec.

spell.name: Pursuit of Justice
spell.description: You gain 15% movement speed at all times, plus an additional 5% movement speed for each current charge of Holy Power up to 3.

spell.name: Fist of Justice
spell.description:
Stuns the target for 6 sec.



Replaces Hammer of Justice.

spell.name: Repentance
spell.description: Puts the enemy target in a state of meditation, incapacitating them for up to 1 min.  Any damage from sources other than Censure will awaken the target.  Usable against Demons, Dragonkin, Giants, Humanoids and Undead.

spell.name: Burden of Guilt
spell.description: Your Judgment hits fill your target with doubt and remorse, reducing movement speed by 50% for 12 sec.

spell.name: Selfless Healer
spell.description: Your successful Judgments reduce the cast time and mana cost of your next Flash of Light by 35% per stack and improves its effectiveness by 20% per stack when used to heal others. Stacks up to 3 times.

spell.name: Eternal Flame
spell.description:
Consumes up to 3 Holy Power to place a protective Holy flame on a friendly target, which heals them for 5,629 and an additional 519 every 3 sec for 30 sec. Healing increased per charge of Holy Power. The heal over time is increased by 100% if used on the Paladin.



Replaces Word of Glory.

spell.name: Sacred Shield
spell.description:
Protects the target with a shield of Holy Light for 30 sec. The shield absorbs up to 562 damage every 6 sec.



Can be active only on one target at a time.

spell.name: Hand of Purity
spell.description: Places a Hand on the friendly target, reducing damage taken by 10% and damage from harmful periodic effects by an additional 70% for 6 sec. Players may only have one Hand on them per Paladin at any one time.

spell.name: Unbreakable Spirit
spell.description: When your Divine Shield, Divine Protection or Lay on Hands are on cooldown, spending Holy Power will reduce the remaining cooldown by 1% per Holy Power spent, up to a maximum of 50% reduction.

spell.name: Clemency
spell.description: You can use Hand of Freedom, Hand of Protection, Hand of Sacrifice and Hand of Salvation twice each before incurring their cooldowns.

spell.name: Holy Avenger
spell.description: Abilities that generate Holy Power will deal 30% additional damage and healing, and generate 3 charges of Holy Power for the next 18 sec.

spell.name: Sanctified Wrath
spell.description:
Avenging Wrath lasts 50% longer and grants more frequent access to one of your abilities while it lasts.



Holy

Reduces the cooldown of Holy Shock by 50%.



Protection

Reduces the cooldown of Judgment by 50%. Avenging Wrath also increases healing received by 20%.



Retribution

Reduces the cooldown of Hammer of Wrath by 50%.

spell.name: Divine Purpose
spell.description:
Abilities that cost Holy Power have a 25% chance to cause the Divine Purpose effect. 



Divine Purpose

Your next Holy Power ability will consume no Holy Power and will cast as if 3 Holy Power were consumed. Lasts 8 sec.

spell.name: Holy Prism
spell.description:
Sends a beam of light toward a target, turning them into a prism for Holy energy.



If an enemy is the prism, they take 16,404 Holy damage and radiate 11,060 healing to 5 nearby allies within 15 yards.



If an ally is the prism, they are healed for 16,404 and radiate 11,060 Holy damage to 5 nearby enemies within 15 yards.

spell.name: Light's Hammer
spell.description:
Hurl a Light-infused hammer into the ground, where it will blast a 10 yard area with Arcing Light for 14 sec.



Arcing Light

Deals 3,690 Holy damage to enemies and reduces their movement speed by 50% for 2 sec. Heals allies for 3,690 every 2 sec.

spell.name: Execution Sentence
spell.description:
A hammer slowly falls from the sky, causing 14,099 Holy damage over 10 sec. This damage is dealt slowly at first and increases over time, culminating in a final burst of damage.



Stay of Execution

If used on friendly targets, the falling hammer heals the target for 14,099 healing over 10 sec. This healing is dealt slowly at first and increases over time, culminating in a final burst of healing.

specs.name: Holy
specs.description: Invokes the power of the Light to protect and to heal.

specs.name: Protection
specs.description: Uses Holy magic to shield himself and defend allies from attackers.

specs.name: Retribution
specs.description: A righteous crusader who judges and punishes opponents with weapons and Holy magic.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Aspect of the Pack
Glyph of Aspect of the Cheetah
Glyph of Aspect of the Beast

spell.name: Posthaste
spell.description: Your Disengage frees you from all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 60% for 8 sec.

spell.name: Narrow Escape
spell.description: When you Disengage, you also activate a web trap which encases all targets within 8 yards in sticky webs, preventing movement for 8 sec.

spell.name: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Chimera
spell.description: Reduces the cooldown of Disengage by 10 sec, and the cooldown of Deterrence by 60 sec.

spell.name: Silencing Shot
spell.description: A shot that silences the target and interrupts spellcasting for 3 sec.

spell.name: Wyvern Sting
spell.description: A stinging shot that puts the target to sleep for 30 sec.  Any damage will cancel the effect.  Only one Sting per Hunter can be active on the target at a time.

spell.name: Intimidation
spell.description: Command your pet to intimidate the target, stunning it for 3 sec.

spell.name: Exhilaration
spell.description: Instantly heals you for 30% and your pet for 100% of total health.

spell.name: Aspect of the Iron Hawk
spell.description:
The Hunter takes on the aspects of an iron hawk, increasing ranged attack power by 25%, and reducing all damage taken by 15%. Only one Aspect can be active at a time.



Replaces Aspect of the Hawk.

spell.name: Spirit Bond
spell.description: While your pet is active, you and your pet will regenerate 2% of total health every 2 sec.

spell.name: Fervor
spell.description: Instantly restores 50 Focus to you and your pet and an additional 50 Focus over 10 sec.

spell.name: Dire Beast
spell.description: Summons a powerful wild beast to attack your target for 15 sec.  Each time the beast deals damage, you will gain 5 Focus.

spell.name: Thrill of the Hunt
spell.description: You have a 30% chance when you fire a ranged attack that costs Focus or Kill Command to reduce the Focus cost of your next 3 Arcane Shots or Multi-Shots by 20.

spell.name: A Murder of Crows
spell.description: Summons a flock of crows to attack your target over the next 30 sec.  If used on a target below 20% health, the cooldown is reduced to 60 seconds.

spell.name: Blink Strikes
spell.description: Your pet's Basic Attacks deal 50% increased damage, can now be used from 30 yards away, and will instantly teleport them behind their target.

spell.name: Lynx Rush
spell.description:
Your pet rapidly charges from target to target, attacking 9 times over 4 sec.  Each attack causes the target to bleed for 340 damage over 15 sec, stacking up to 9 times.



The pet must be within 10 yards of the target to Lynx Rush.

spell.name: Glaive Toss
spell.description:
You hurl two glaives toward a target, each dealing 883.50 damage to each enemy struck and reducing movement speed by 30% for 3 sec.  The primary target will take 4 times as much damage from each strike.



The Glaives will return back to you, damaging and snaring targets again as they return.

spell.name: Powershot
spell.description:
You wind up a powerful shot, which deals 600% weapon damage to the target and 300% weapon damage to all enemies in between you and the target.



Enemies hit by Powershot are also knocked back.

spell.name: Barrage
spell.description:
Rapidly fire a spray of shots forward for 3 sec, dealing a total of 640% weapon damage to the enemy target and an average of 320% weapon damage to each other enemy target in front of you.



Useable while moving.

specs.name: Beast Mastery
specs.description: A master of the wild who can tame a wide variety of beasts to assist her in combat.

specs.name: Marksmanship
specs.description: A master archer or sharpshooter who excels in bringing down enemies from afar.

specs.name: Survival
specs.description: A rugged tracker who favors using animal venom, explosives and traps as deadly weapons.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Tricks of the Trade

spell.name: Nightstalker
spell.description: Increases your movement speed while stealthed by 20%, and the damage your abilities deal while stealthed by 25%.

spell.name: Subterfuge
spell.description: Your Stealth breaks 3 sec after dealing or receiving hostile actions, rather than doing so immediately.

spell.name: Shadow Focus
spell.description: Abilities cost 75% less Energy while you are stealthed.

spell.name: Deadly Throw
spell.description:
Finishing move that reduces the movement speed of the target by 50% for 6 sec.  If performed with 3 combo points, also interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for a period of time.

Damage dealt:

   1 point  : 275-809 damage

   2 points: 282-816 damage

   3 points: 289-823 damage

   4 points: 295-829 damage

   5 points: 302-836 damage

spell.name: Nerve Strike
spell.description: A successful Kidney Shot or Cheap Shot also reduces the damage dealt by the target by 50% and healing done by the target by 10% for 6 sec seconds after the effect fades.

spell.name: Combat Readiness
spell.description:
Enter into a state of heightened awareness, deflecting enemy weapon strikes with increasing effectiveness.  Successive attacks will deal 10% less damage per application, stacking 5 times.



Lasts for 20 sec, but if 10 sec elapse without any incoming weapon strikes, this state will end.

spell.name: Cheat Death
spell.description: An attack that would otherwise be fatal will instead reduce you to no less than 10% of your maximum health, and damage taken will be reduced by 80% for 3 sec.  This effect cannot occur more than once per 90 seconds.

spell.name: Leeching Poison
spell.description: Coats your weapons with a Non-Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour.  Your melee attacks have a 50% chance to poison the target for 10 sec. Your subsequent weapon strikes against the poisoned target will heal you for 10% of damage dealt.

spell.name: Elusiveness
spell.description: Your Feint ability also reduces all damage taken by 30% for 5 sec.

spell.name: Cloak and Dagger
spell.description: Your Ambush, Garrote, and Cheap Shot abilities can now be used from 20 yards away, and will cause you to appear behind your target.

spell.name: Shadowstep
spell.description: Step through the shadows and appear behind a target.  Movement speed is increased by 70% for 2 sec afterwards.

spell.name: Burst of Speed
spell.description: Increases movement speed by 70% for 4 sec and removes any movement-slowing effects. Does not break stealth.

spell.name: Prey on the Weak
spell.description: When you disable an enemy with Kidney Shot, Cheap Shot, Gouge, Sap, or Blind, they suffer 10% increased damage from all sources for the duration of the effect.

spell.name: Paralytic Poison
spell.description: Coats your weapons with a Non-Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour.  Each strike has a 20% chance of poisoning the enemy for 15 sec.  Stacks up to 5 times on a single target, and upon a fifth application, the enemy will be stunned for 4 seconds.

spell.name: Dirty Tricks
spell.description: Your Gouge and Blind no longer have an Energy cost, and no longer break from damage dealt by your Poison and Bleed effects.

spell.name: Shuriken Toss
spell.description:
A ranged attack that deals 2,527 Physical damage to an enemy target. If the enemy is farther than 10 yards away, your autoattacks will be replaced with ranged shuriken for up to 10 sec, granting them a 30 yd range. Shurikens are coated in your Lethal Poison. Awards 1 combo point. 



Replaces Throw.

spell.name: Marked for Death
spell.description: Mark the target, instantly generating 5 combo points on them. If the target dies within 1 min Marked for Death's cooldown is reset.

spell.name: Anticipation
spell.description:
When one of your attacks generates a combo point on a target that already has 5 combo points, you gain an Anticipation charge, up to a maximum of 5.



When you perform an offensive finishing move on an enemy, any Anticipation charges are consumed to grant you an equal number of combo points on that target.

specs.name: Assassination
specs.description: A deadly master of poisons who dispatches victims with vicious dagger strikes.

specs.name: Combat
specs.description: A swashbuckler who uses agility and guile to stand toe-to-toe with enemies.

specs.name: Subtlety
specs.description: A dark stalker who leaps from the shadows to ambush her unsuspecting prey.

spell.name: Void Tendrils
spell.description: Summons Shadowy tendrils out of the ground, rooting up to 5 enemy targets within 8 yards of the caster for 20 sec. Killing the tendril will cancel the effect.

spell.name: Psyfiend
spell.description:
Summons a Psyfiend that stands in place for 10 sec. The Psyfiend casts a Psychic Terror on a nearby enemy within 20 yards every 2 sec, preferring anything attacking the Priest.



Psychic Terror causes enemies to flee for 30 sec. Damage caused may interrupt the effect.

spell.name: Dominate Mind
spell.description: Controls a mind up to level 93 for 30 sec.  Does not work versus Mechanical beings.

spell.name: Body and Soul
spell.description: When you cast Power Word: Shield or Leap of Faith, you increase the target's movement speed by 60% for 4 sec.

spell.name: Angelic Feather
spell.description:
Place a feather at the target location. If allies walk through it, they gain 60% increased movement speed for 6 sec. 



Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time. Accumulates an additional charge once every 10 sec.

spell.name: Phantasm
spell.description: When you Fade, you remove all movement impairing effects from yourself, and your movement speed is unhindered for 5 sec.

spell.name: From Darkness, Comes Light
spell.description:
Discipline, Holy:

Surge of Light

You have a 15% chance when you Smite, Heal, Flash Heal, Binding Heal or Greater Heal to cause your next Flash Heal to be instant cast and have no mana cost. Limit 2 charges.



Shadow:

Surge of Darkness

Periodic damage from your Vampiric Touch has a 15% chance to cause your next Mind Spike to not consume your damage-over-time effects, become instant cast, cost no mana, and deal 50% additional damage. Limit 2 charges.

spell.name: Mindbender
spell.description:
Creates a Mindbender to attack the target.  Caster receives 1.46% mana when the Mindbender attacks. Lasts 15 sec.



Replaces Shadowfiend.

spell.name: Solace and Insanity
spell.description:
Discipline, Holy:

You gain the Power Word: Solace ability.



Shadow:

Your Devouring Plague increases the damage of Mind Flay by 33% per orb consumed.

spell.name: Desperate Prayer
spell.description: Instantly heals the caster for 30% of their total health.

spell.name: Spectral Guise
spell.description: Your shadow blurs into the darkness, leaving your true form behind. As a shadow you are stealthed, but remain in combat. Lasts 6 sec or until your true form is hit by 3 direct attacks.

spell.name: Angelic Bulwark
spell.description:
Anytime a damaging attack brings you below 30% health, you gain an absorption shield equal to 20% of your total health lasting for 20 sec.



This effect cannot occur more than once every 90 sec.

spell.name: Twist of Fate
spell.description: After damaging or healing a target below 20% health, you deal 15% increased damage and healing for 10 sec.

spell.name: Power Infusion
spell.description: Infuses the Priest with power, increasing spell casting speed by 20%, all damage by 5%, and reducing the mana cost of all spells by 20%.  Lasts 20 sec.

spell.name: Divine Insight
spell.description:
Discipline:

When you cast Penance, there is a 40% chance your next Power Word: Shield will both ignore and not cause the Weakened Soul effect.



Holy:

When you cast Greater Heal or Prayer of Healing, there is a 40% chance your next Prayer of Mending will not trigger its cooldown, and will jump to each target instantly.



Shadow:

Periodic damage from your Shadow Word: Pain has a 5% chance to reset the cooldown on Mind Blast and cause your next Mind Blast within 12 sec to be instant cast and cost no mana.

spell.name: Cascade
spell.description:
Launches a Holy bolt at the target that grows in power as it travels, which causes up to 12,821 damage to an enemy, or up to 12,821 healing to an ally.



This effect can bounce from allies to other allies, or from enemies to other enemies. Each time it bounces it will split into 2 bolts, preferring farther away targets, and never hitting the same target twice. Cascade can bounce up to 3 times.

spell.name: Divine Star
spell.description:
Fires a Divine Star in front of you, traveling 24 yds, causing 4,802 Divine damage to all enemies and 8,003 healing to all allies within 4 yds of its path.



After reaching its destination it will return to you, also dealing damage and healing to all targets in its path.

spell.name: Halo
spell.description: Creates a ring of Holy energy around you that quickly expands and grows in power, up to 30 yds away. Deals up to 20,580 Holy damage to enemies, and up to 34,301 healing to allies, with the greatest effect at 25 yds.

specs.name: Discipline
specs.description: Uses magic to shield allies from taking damage as well as heal their wounds.

specs.name: Holy
specs.description: A versatile healer who can reverse damage on individuals or groups and even heal from beyond the grave.

specs.name: Shadow
specs.description: Uses sinister Shadow magic, especially damage-over-time spells, to eradicate enemies.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Army of the Dead

spell.name: Roiling Blood
spell.description: Your Blood Boil ability now also triggers Pestilence if it strikes a diseased target.

spell.name: Plague Leech
spell.description: Draw forth the infection from an enemy, consuming your Blood Plague and Frost Fever diseases on the target to activate a random fully-depleted rune as a Death Rune.

spell.name: Unholy Blight
spell.description: Surrounds the Death Knight with a vile swarm of unholy insects for 10 sec, stinging all enemies within 10 yards every 1 sec, infecting them with Blood Plague and Frost Fever.

spell.name: Lichborne
spell.description: Draw upon unholy energy to become undead for 10 sec.  While undead, you are immune to Charm, Fear, and Sleep effects, and Death Coil will heal you.

spell.name: Anti-Magic Zone
spell.description: Places a large, stationary Anti-Magic Zone that reduces spell damage done to party or raid members inside it by 75%.  The Anti-Magic Zone lasts for 10 sec or until it absorbs at least 136,800 spell damage.

spell.name: Purgatory
spell.description:
An unholy pact grants you the ability to fight on through damage that would kill mere mortals. When you would sustain fatal damage, you instead are wrapped in a Shroud of Purgatory, absorbing incoming healing equal to the amount of damage prevented, lasting 3 sec.



If any healing absorption remains when Shroud of Purgatory expires, you die. Otherwise, you survive.  This effect may only occur every 3 min.

spell.name: Death's Advance
spell.description:
You passively move 10% faster, and movement-impairing effects may not reduce you below 70% of normal movement speed.



When activated, you gain 30% movement speed and may not be slowed below 100% of normal movement speed for 6 seconds.

spell.name: Chilblains
spell.description: Victims of your Frost Fever disease are Chilled, reducing movement speed by 50% for 10 sec, and your Chains of Ice immobilizes targets for 3 sec.

spell.name: Asphyxiate
spell.description:
Lifts an enemy target off the ground and crushes their throat with dark energy, stunning them for 5 sec.  Functions as a silence if the target is immune to stuns.



Replaces Strangulate.

spell.name: Death Pact
spell.description: Drain vitality from an undead minion, healing the Death Knight for 50% of her maximum health and causing the minion to suffer damage equal to 50% of its maximum health.

spell.name: Death Siphon
spell.description: Deal 7,497 Shadowfrost damage to an enemy, healing the Death Knight for 150% of damage dealt.

spell.name: Conversion
spell.description: Continuously converts Runic Power to health, restoring 3% of maximum health every 1 sec. Only base Runic Power generation from spending runes may occur while Conversion is active. This effect lasts until canceled, or Runic Power is exhausted.

spell.name: Blood Tap
spell.description: Each damaging Death Coil, Frost Strike, or Rune Strike generates 2 Blood Charges, up to a maximum of 12 charges.  Blood Tap consumes 5 Blood Charges to activate a random fully-depleted rune as a Death Rune.

spell.name: Runic Empowerment
spell.description: When you land a damaging Death Coil, Frost Strike, or Rune Strike, you have a 45% chance to activate a random fully-depleted rune.

spell.name: Runic Corruption
spell.description: When you land a damaging Death Coil, Frost Strike, or Rune Strike, you have a 45% chance to activate Runic Corruption, increasing your rune regeneration rate by 100% for 3 sec.

spell.name: Gorefiend's Grasp
spell.description: Shadowy tendrils coil around all enemies within 0 yards of a target (hostile or friendly), pulling them to the target's location.

spell.name: Remorseless Winter
spell.description: Surrounds the Death Knight with a swirling tempest of frigid air for 8 sec, chilling enemies within 8 yards every 1 sec. Each pulse reduces targets' movement speed by 15% for 3 sec, stacking up to 5 times. Upon receiving a fifth application, an enemy will be stunned for 6 sec.

spell.name: Desecrated Ground
spell.description: Corrupts the ground in a 8 yard radius beneath the Death Knight for 10 sec. While standing in this corruption, the Death Knight is immune to effects that cause loss of control. This ability instantly removes such effects when activated.

specs.name: Blood
specs.description: A dark guardian who manipulates and corrupts life energy to sustain herself in the face of an enemy onslaught.

specs.name: Frost
specs.description: An icy harbinger of doom, channeling runic power and delivering vicious weapon strikes.

specs.name: Unholy
specs.description: A master of death and decay, spreading infection and controlling undead minions to do his bidding.

spell.name: Nature's Guardian
spell.description: Whenever a damaging attack brings you below 30% health, your maximum health is increased by 25% for 10 sec, and your threat level towards the attacker is reduced.  This effect cannot occur more often than once every 30 sec.

spell.name: Stone Bulwark Totem
spell.description: Summons an Earth Totem with 10% of the caster's health at the feet of the caster for 30 sec that grants the caster a shield absorbing 491 damage for 10 sec, and up to an additional 164 every 5 sec thereafter.

spell.name: Astral Shift
spell.description: Seek haven by shifting partially into the elemental planes, reducing damage taken by 40% for 6 sec.

spell.name: Frozen Power
spell.description: Your Frost Shock now also roots the target in ice for 5 sec.

spell.name: Earthgrab Totem
spell.description:
Summons an Earth Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster for 20 sec. The totem pulses every 2 sec, causing roots to ensnare the legs of all enemies within 10 yards for 5 sec, preventing movement.  Enemies that have already been rooted once by the totem will instead have their movement speed reduced by 50%.



Replaces Earthbind Totem.

spell.name: Windwalk Totem
spell.description: Summons an Air Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster for 6 sec, granting raid members within 40 yards immunity to movement-impairing effects.

spell.name: Call of the Elements
spell.description: When activated, immediately finishes the cooldown on all totems with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.

spell.name: Totemic Restoration
spell.description: When a totem is replaced or destroyed before its duration expires naturally, its cooldown is reduced in proportion to the lost duration, up to a maximum of 50% of the full cooldown.

spell.name: Totemic Projection
spell.description: Relocates your active totems to the specified location.

spell.name: Elemental Mastery
spell.description: Call upon elemental forces, empowering you with 30% haste for 20 sec.

spell.name: Ancestral Swiftness
spell.description:
Your next Nature spell with a base casting time less than 10 sec. becomes an instant cast spell.



Passive:

Increases spell haste by 5% and melee haste by 10%.

spell.name: Echo of the Elements
spell.description: When one of your spells causes direct damage or healing, you have a chance to gain Echo of the Elements, duplicating that spell's effect.

spell.name: Healing Tide Totem
spell.description: Summons a Water Totem with 10% of the caster's health at the feet of the caster for 10 sec. The Healing Tide Totem pulses every 2 sec, healing the 5 most injured party or raid members within 40 yards for 5,023.

spell.name: Ancestral Guidance
spell.description: When you deal direct damage or healing for the next 10 sec, 40% of damage or 60% of healing is copied as healing to up to 3 nearby injured party or raid members.

spell.name: Conductivity
spell.description:
When you cast Healing Wave, Greater Healing Wave, or Healing Surge, allies within your Healing Rain share healing equal to 30% of the initial healing done.



If your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Earth Shock, or Stormstrike damages an enemy, allies within your Healing Rain share healing equal to 50% of the initial damage done.

spell.name: Unleashed Fury
spell.description:
Your elemental weapon imbues are empowered, granting additional effects when triggered with Unleash Elements:



Flametongue Weapon 

Increases the enemy target's damage taken from your Lightning Bolt by 20%, and from your Lava Burst by 10% for 10 sec.



Windfury Weapon 

For 8 sec, your melee autoattacks can trigger Static Shock.



Earthliving Weapon

Further increases the effectiveness of your next single-target heal on the targeted ally by 50%.



Frostbrand Weapon

You leech heat from the enemy target, gaining 50% movement speed for 4 sec.



Rockbiter Weapon

You take 40% reduced damage from the enemy target for 5 sec.

spell.name: Primal Elementalist
spell.description: Your Earth and Fire Elemental Totems draw forth powerful primal elementals directly from the elemental planes.  These servitors are 80% more powerful than regular elementals, act as pets directly under your control, and gain additional abilities.

spell.name: Elemental Blast
spell.description: Harness and direct the raw power of the elements towards an enemy target, dealing 5,119 Elemental damage and increasing the caster's Agility, Critical Strike, Haste, or Mastery by 3,500 for 8 sec.

specs.name: Elemental
specs.description: A spellcaster who harnesses the destructive forces of nature and the elements.

specs.name: Enhancement
specs.description: A totemic warrior who strikes foes with weapons imbued with elemental power.

specs.name: Restoration
specs.description: A healer who calls upon ancestral spirits and the cleansing power of water to mend allies' wounds.

spell.name: Presence of Mind
spell.description:
When activated, your next Mage spell with a casting time less than 10 sec becomes an instant cast spell.



This spell is not on the global cooldown.

spell.name: Blazing Speed
spell.description:
Suppresses movement slowing effects and increases your movement speed by 150% for 1.50 sec. 



This spell may be cast while a cast time spell is in progress and is not on the global cooldown.

spell.name: Ice Floes
spell.description: Allows you to move while casting and channeling the next 2 Mage spells that have a base cast or channel time less than 4 sec. This spell may be cast while a cast time spell is in progress and is not on the global cooldown. Lasts 15 sec.

spell.name: Temporal Shield
spell.description: Envelops you in a temporal shield for 4 sec. Damage taken while shielded will be healed back over 6 sec. This spell is usable while stunned, frozen, incapacitated, feared or asleep, and is not on the global cooldown.

spell.name: Flameglow
spell.description: Protects you with fiery energy, absorbing 37 damage from each attack against you (up to a maximum of 30% of the attack).

spell.name: Ice Barrier
spell.description: Instantly shields you, absorbing 5,197 damage.  Lasts 1 min.  While the shield holds, spellcasting will not be delayed by damage.

spell.name: Ring of Frost
spell.description: Summons a Ring of Frost at the target location. Enemies entering the ring will become frozen for 10 sec. Lasts 10 sec. 10 yd radius. Limit 10 targets.

spell.name: Ice Ward
spell.description: Places an Ice Ward on a friendly target. When an enemy strikes the target, all enemies within 10 yds will become frozen in place for 5 sec. 1 charge.  Lasts 30 sec.

spell.name: Frostjaw
spell.description: Silences and freezes the target in place for 8 sec. Lasts half as long versus Player targets.  Damage caused may interrupt the effect.

spell.name: Greater Invisibility
spell.description:
Instantly makes the caster invisible, reducing all threat, and removing two damage over time effects. While invisible, you are untargetable by enemies.  Lasts 20 sec.  Invisibility is cancelled if you perform any actions.



Damage taken is reduced by 90% while invisible and for 3 sec after coming out of invisibility.



Replaces Invisibility.

spell.name: Cauterize
spell.description:
An attack which would otherwise kill you will instead bring you to 50% of your maximum health, and you will burn for 40% of your maximum health over the next 6 sec.



Cauterize cannot occur more than once every 2 min.

spell.name: Cold Snap
spell.description:
When activated, this spell finishes the cooldown of your Ice Block, Frost Nova, and Cone of Cold spells, and heals you for 30% of your maximum health.



This spell is usable while stunned, frozen, incapacitated, feared or asleep, and is not on the global cooldown.

spell.name: Nether Tempest
spell.description: Places a Nether Tempest on the target which deals 4,452 Arcane damage over 12 sec. Each time Nether Tempest deals damage, an additional 50% of that damage is also dealt to a random target within 10 yards.

spell.name: Living Bomb
spell.description:
The target becomes a Living Bomb, taking 4,888 Fire damage over 12 sec. When this effect ends, or the target dies, it explodes to deal an additional 489 Fire damage to the target and all other enemies within 10 yards. Limit 3 targets.



This spell has a 1.0 sec global cooldown.

spell.name: Frost Bomb
spell.description: Places a Frost Bomb on the target.  After 4 sec, the bomb explodes, dealing 5,245 Frost damage to the primary target, and 2,624 Frost damage to all other targets within 10 yds.  All affected targets are slowed by 70% for 2 sec. Frost Bomb's countdown and cooldown are reduced by haste.

spell.name: Invocation
spell.description:
Removes Evocation's cooldown and reduces its channel period and duration by 50%.



Completing an Evocation causes you to deal 15% increased spell damage, but passively regenerate 50% less mana, for 1 min.

spell.name: Rune of Power
spell.description:
Places a Rune of Power on the ground, which lasts for 1 min. While standing in your own Rune of Power, your mana regeneration is increased by 75% and your spell damage is increased by 15%. Only 2 Runes of Power can be placed at one time.



Replaces Evocation.

spell.name: Incanter's Ward
spell.description:
Places a magical ward on you, absorbing up to 1,228 damage for 8 sec. Absorbed damage will restore up to 18% of your maximum mana.



When this effect ends, you gain up to 30% increased spell damage for 15 sec, based on the absorption used.



Passive:

Increases spell damage by 6% and increases mana regeneration by 65%. This effect is deactivated while Incanter's Ward is on cooldown.

specs.name: Arcane
specs.description: Manipulate the arcane, destroying enemies with overwhelming power.

specs.name: Fire
specs.description: Ignite enemies with balls of fire and combustive flames.

specs.name: Frost
specs.description: Freezes enemies in their tracks and shatters them with Frost magic.

spell.name: Dark Regeneration
spell.description: Restores 30% of you and your pet's maximum health and increases all healing received by 25% over 12 sec.

spell.name: Soul Leech
spell.description: Your Shadow Bolt, Soul Fire, Fel Flame and Touch of Chaos spells grant you and your pet a shadowy shield that absorbs 10% of the damage dealt for 15 sec.

spell.name: Harvest Life
spell.description:
Drains the life from all enemies within 15 yards of the target, causing 220 Shadow damage and restoring 3-4.5% of the caster's total health every 1 sec. Lasts 6 sec.



Replaces Drain Life.



Generates 10 Demonic Fury per second plus 3 Demonic Fury per second on secondary targets.
spell.powerCost: 1% of base mana, plus 1% per sec

spell.name: Howl of Terror
spell.description:
Howl, causing 5 enemies within 10 yds to flee in fear for 20 sec. Damage caused may cancel Howl of Terror.



When hit by a damaging attack, the cooldown on Howl of Terror is reduced by 1 sec.

spell.name: Mortal Coil
spell.description: Causes the enemy target to run in horror for 3 sec. The caster restores 15% of their maximum health.

spell.name: Shadowfury
spell.description: Shadowfury is unleashed, stunning all enemies within 8 yds for 3 sec.

spell.name: Soul Link
spell.description:
When active, all damage and healing you and your demon take is shared, but your demon's health is reduced by 50%. Recasting this spell cancels the effect.



Replaces Health Funnel.

spell.name: Sacrificial Pact
spell.description:
Your demon sacrifices 25% of its current health to shield its master for 400% of the sacrificed health. Lasts 20 sec.



If you have no demon, your health is sacrificed instead. Can be cast while suffering from control impairing effects.

spell.name: Dark Bargain
spell.description:
Prevents all damage for 8 sec.



When the shield fades, 50% of the damage prevented is dealt over 8 sec. Can be cast while suffering from control impairing effects.

spell.name: Blood Horror
spell.description: While active, any time an enemy melee attack deals damage to the Warlock, the enemy will run in horror for up to 4 sec. 1 charge. Blood Horror lasts 1 min.

spell.name: Burning Rush
spell.description:
Drains 4% of your maximum health per second to increase your movement speed by 50%. During Burning Rush, movement-impairing effects may not reduce you below 100% of normal movement speed.



Lasts until cancelled.

spell.name: Unbound Will
spell.description: Purge all Magic effects, movement impairing effects and all effects which cause loss of control of your character or demon.

spell.name: Grimoire of Supremacy
spell.description:
You command stronger demons, replacing your normal minions. These demons deal 20% additional damage and have more powerful abilities. 



Spells Learned:

 Summon Fel Imp

 Summon Voidlord

 Summon Shivarra

 Summon Observer 

 Summon Wrathguard

 Summon Abyssal

 Summon Terrorguard

spell.name: Grimoire of Service
spell.description:
Instantly summon a second demon, who fights for 20 sec. The demon will instantly use one of their special abilities when summoned:



 Grimoire: Imp: Immediately cleanses a hostile magic effect from their master.

 Grimoire: Voidwalker Immediately taunts their target when summoned.

 Grimoire: Succubus Immediately seduces their target if it is Humanoid.

 Grimoire: Felhunter Immediately interrupts their target when summoned.

 Grimoire: Felguard Immediately stuns their target when summoned.

spell.name: Grimoire of Sacrifice
spell.description:
You sacrifice your demon to gain one of its abilities, increase the power of many of your single target spells by 25% and regenerate 2% of maximum health every 5 sec. Lasts for 1 hour. 



Summoning another demon cancels the effect.

spell.name: Archimonde's Vengeance
spell.description:
Causes an enemy to suffer 25% of all damage you take. Lasts 8 sec.



Passive:

Enemies who attack you suffer 5% of all damage they deal to you. This effect is disabled while on cooldown.

spell.name: Kil'jaeden's Cunning
spell.description: You can cast and channel while moving, but each cast reduces your movement speed by 15% for 6 sec, stacking up to 2 times.

spell.name: Mannoroth's Fury
spell.description: Increases the area of your area of effect damage spells by 500%.

specs.name: Affliction
specs.description: A master of shadow magic who specializes in drains and damage-over-time spells.

specs.name: Demonology
specs.description: A master of demonic magic who transforms into a demon and compels demonic powers to aid him.

specs.name: Destruction
specs.description: A master of chaos who calls down fire to burn and demolish enemies.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Leer of the Ox

spell.name: Celerity
spell.description: Allows you to Roll and Chi Torpedo more often, increases their maximum number of charges by 1, and reduces their cooldown by 5 sec.

spell.name: Tiger's Lust
spell.description: Instantly clears the target of all immobilizing and movement impairing effects, and increases their movement speed by 70% for 6 sec.

spell.name: Momentum
spell.description: Every time you Roll or Chi Torpedo, your movement speed is increased by 25% for 10 sec. Stacks up to 2 times.

spell.name: Chi Wave
spell.description:
You cause a wave of Chi energy to flow through friend and foe, dealing 519 Nature damage or 519 healing. Bounces up to 7 times to the nearest targets within 25 yards.



When bouncing to allies, Chi Wave will prefer those injured over full health.

spell.name: Zen Sphere
spell.description:
Forms a Zen Sphere above the target, healing the target for 104 and dealing 104 Nature damage to the nearest enemy within 10 yards of the target every 2 sec for 16 sec. Only two Zen Spheres can be summoned at any one time.



If the target of the Zen Sphere reaches 35% or lower health or if the Zen Sphere is dispelled or expires it will detonate, dealing 424 Nature damage and 269 healing to all targets within 10 yards.

spell.name: Chi Burst
spell.description:
You summon a torrent of Chi energy and hurl it at the target, dealing 1,393 Nature damage to all enemies, and 1,152 healing to all allies in its path. Chi Burst will always heal the Monk.



While casting Chi Burst, you continue to dodge, parry, and auto-attack.

spell.name: Power Strikes
spell.description:
Every 20 sec, you gain Power Strikes, causing your next Jab, Soothing Mist, or Crackling Jade Lightning to generate 1 additional Chi.



If you are already at maximum Chi, a Chi Sphere will be summoned near you.

spell.name: Ascension
spell.description: Increases your maximum Chi by 1, your maximum mana by 15%, and your energy regen by 15%.

spell.name: Chi Brew
spell.description: Instantly restores all of your Chi.

spell.name: Ring of Peace
spell.description: Forms a sanctuary around the friendly target, instantly silencing and disarming all enemies for 3 sec. In addition, enemies who attack or cast spells on allies within the ring of peace will be disarmed and silenced for an additional 3 sec. Ring of Peace lasts for 8 sec.

spell.name: Charging Ox Wave
spell.description: A mighty Ox effigy rushes forward 30 yards in front of you, stunning all enemies within its path for 3 sec.

spell.name: Leg Sweep
spell.description: You knock down all enemies within 5 yards, effectively stunning them for 5 sec.

spell.name: Healing Elixirs
spell.description: Every 18 sec, you gain Healing Elixirs, causing your next Brew or Tea to also heal you for 15% of your total health.

spell.name: Dampen Harm
spell.description:
You dampen the damage from the most harmful attacks done to you. The next 3 attacks within 45 sec that deal damage equal to 20% or more of your total health are reduced by half.



Dampen Harm can be cast while stunned.

spell.name: Diffuse Magic
spell.description: Reduces all spell damage taken by 90% and clears all magical effects on you, reversing them back to their original caster if within 40 yards if possible. Lasts for 6 sec.

spell.name: Rushing Jade Wind
spell.description:
You summon a whirling tornado that travels 30 yards in front of you, dealing 5,539 Nature damage to all targets in its path and increasing damage taken by your Spinning Crane Kick by 30% for 8 sec.



Brewmaster 

Causes Shuffle when cast.



Mistweaver

Increases the healing done by your Spinning Crane Kick by 50% for 12 sec.

spell.name: Invoke Xuen, the White Tiger
spell.description:
Invokes the White Tiger Celestial, summoning an effigy at the command of the caster. The effigy will assist you, attacking your primary target and also inflicting tiger lightning every 6 sec to 3 nearby enemies within 10 yards dealing 1,750 damage over 5 sec. Lasts for 45 sec.



Brewmaster 

Xuen will also taunt the target, forcing it to attack him.

spell.name: Chi Torpedo
spell.description:
Torpedo a distance in front of you, dealing 2,100 Nature damage to all enemies and 8,430 healing to all allies in your path.



Chi Torpedo replaces Roll.

specs.name: Brewmaster
specs.description: A sturdy brawler who uses liquid fortification and unpredictable movement to avoid damage and protect allies.

specs.name: Mistweaver
specs.description: A healer who mixes traditional herbal medicine with Pandaren martial arts.

specs.name: Windwalker
specs.description: A martial artist without peer who pummels foes with hands and fists.

spell.name: Feline Swiftness
spell.description: Increases your movement speed by 15%.

spell.name: Displacer Beast
spell.description: Teleports the Druid up to 20 yards forward, activates Cat Form, and increases movement speed by 50% for 4 sec.

spell.name: Wild Charge
spell.description: Fly to a nearby ally's position.

spell.name: Nature's Swiftness
spell.description: When activated, your next Cyclone, Entangling Roots, Healing Touch, Hibernate, Nourish, Rebirth, or Regrowth becomes instant, free, and castable in all forms.  The healing and duration of the spell is increased by 50%.

spell.name: Renewal
spell.description: Instantly heals the Druid for 30% of maximum health.  Useable in all shapeshift forms.

spell.name: Cenarion Ward
spell.description: Protects a friendly target, causing any damage taken to heal the target for 12,543 every 2 sec for 6 sec.  Gaining the healing effect consumes the Cenarion Ward.  Useable in all shapeshift forms.  Lasts 30 sec.

spell.name: Faerie Swarm
spell.description:
Grants an improved version of Faerie Fire that also reduces the target's movement speed by 50% for 15 sec.



This talent replaces Faerie Fire.

spell.name: Mass Entanglement
spell.description: Roots your target in place for 20 sec and spreads to additional nearby enemies.  Affects 5 total targets.  Damage caused may interrupt the effect.  Useable in all shapeshift forms.

spell.name: Typhoon
spell.description: Summons a violent Typhoon that strikes targets in front of the caster within 30 yards, knocking them back and dazing them for 6 sec.  Useable in all shapeshift forms.

spell.name: Soul of the Forest
spell.description:
Aessina's blessing grants a benefit which varies by your combat specialization.



Balance

When a Lunar Eclipse ends you gain 40 Solar Energy and when a Solar Eclipse ends you gain 40 Lunar Energy.



Feral

Your finishing moves grant 4 Energy per combo point.



Guardian

Mangle now generates an additional 3 Rage.



Restoration

You gain 75% haste for your next spell when you cast Swiftmend.

spell.name: Incarnation
spell.description:
Grants a superior shapeshifting form appropriate to your specialization for 30 sec.  You may freely shapeshift in and out of this form for the duration of Incarnation.



Balance: Chosen of Elune

Improved Moonkin Form that gains 25% increased Arcane and Nature damage while Eclipse is active.



Feral: King of the Jungle

Improved Cat Form that allows the use of all abilities which normally require stealth, allows the use of Prowl while in combat, and removes the positional requirement of Ravage.



Guardian: Son of Ursoc

Improved Bear Form that reduces the cooldown on melee damage abilities and Growl to 1.5 sec.



Restoration: Tree of Life

Tree of Life Form that increases healing done by 15%, increases armor by 120%, and enhances Lifebloom, Wild Growth, Regrowth, and Entangling Roots spellcasts.

spell.name: Force of Nature
spell.description:
Summons a Treant to assist in the Druid's current combat role for 15 sec.  Useable in all shapeshift forms.



Balance

Casts Wrath for 1,698 Nature damage every 2 sec and will cast Entangling Roots.

  

Feral

Melees for 8 Physical damage every 2 sec and will use Bash.



Guardian

Melees for 2 Physical damage every 2 sec and will use Taunt.



Restoration

Heals a nearby injured ally for 3,550 every 2.5 sec and will use Swiftmend.

spell.name: Disorienting Roar
spell.description: Invokes the spirit of Ursol to roar, disorienting all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec.  Any damage caused will remove the effect.  Useable in all shapeshift forms.

spell.name: Ursol's Vortex
spell.description:
Conjures a vortex of wind at the destination location that reduces the movement speed of all enemies within 8 yards by 50%.



The first time an enemy attempts to leave the vortex, winds will pull that enemy back to its center.



Lasts 10 sec.  Useable in all shapeshift forms.

spell.name: Mighty Bash
spell.description: Invokes the spirit of Ursoc to stun the target for 5 sec.  Useable in all shapeshift forms.

spell.name: Heart of the Wild
spell.description:
Increases Stamina, Agility, and Intellect by 6% at all times.  When activated, dramatically improves the Druid's ability to perform roles outside of their normal specialization for 45 sec. Grants the following benefits based on current specialization:



Non-Guardian

While in Bear Form, Agility, Expertise, Hit Chance, and armor bonuses increased, Vengeance granted, chance to be hit by melee critical strikes reduced.



Non-Feral

While in Cat Form, Agility, Hit Chance, and Expertise increased.



Non-Restoration

Healing increased and mana cost of all healing spells reduced by 100%.  Guardian Druids may also cast Rejuvenation while shapeshifted.



Non-Balance

Spell Damage and Hit Chance increased.  Mana cost of all damage spells reduced by 100%.

spell.name: Dream of Cenarius
spell.description:
Wrath, Starfire, Starsurge, and melee abilities increase healing done by your next healing spell by 30%. Tranquility is not affected.



Nourish, Healing Touch, and Regrowth increase the damage done by your next 2 Moonfire or Sunfire casts by 50% or by your next 2 melee abilities by 25%.



Each of these bonuses lasts 30 sec.

spell.name: Nature's Vigil
spell.description: Increases all damage and healing done by 10% for 30 sec.  While active, all single-target healing spells also damage a nearby enemy target for 25% of the healing done, and all single-target damage spells and abilities also heal a nearby friendly target for 25% of the damage done.

specs.name: Balance
specs.description: Can take on the form of a powerful Moonkin, balancing the power of Arcane and Nature magic to destroy enemies at a distance.

specs.name: Feral
specs.description: Takes on the form of a great cat to deal damage with bleeds and bites.

specs.name: Guardian
specs.description: Takes on the form of a mighty bear to absorb damage and protect allies.

specs.name: Restoration
specs.description: Uses heal-over-time Nature spells to keep allies alive.
